00036 SCA_PythonMouse::SCA_PythonMouse(SCA_IInputDevice* mouse, RAS_ICanvas* canvas)
00037 : PyObjectPlus(),
00038 m_mouse(mouse),
00039 m_canvas(canvas)
00040 {
00041 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00042     m_event_dict = PyDict_New();
00043 #endif
00044 }
00045 
00046 SCA_PythonMouse::~SCA_PythonMouse()
00047 {
00048 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00049     PyDict_Clear(m_event_dict);
00050     Py_DECREF(m_event_dict);
00051 #endif
00052 }

00087 PyAttributeDef SCA_PythonMouse::Attributes[] = {
00088     KX_PYATTRIBUTE_RO_FUNCTION("events", SCA_PythonMouse, pyattr_get_events),
00089     KX_PYATTRIBUTE_RO_FUNCTION("active_events", SCA_PythonMouse, pyattr_get_active_events),
00090     KX_PYATTRIBUTE_RW_FUNCTION("position", SCA_PythonMouse, pyattr_get_position, pyattr_set_position),

00095 PyObject* SCA_PythonMouse::pyattr_get_events(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00096 {
00097     SCA_PythonMouse* self = static_cast<SCA_PythonMouse*>(self_v);
00098     
00099     for (int i=SCA_IInputDevice::KX_BEGINMOUSE; i<=SCA_IInputDevice::KX_ENDMOUSE; i++)
00100     {
00101         const SCA_InputEvent & inevent = self->m_mouse->GetEventValue((SCA_IInputDevice::KX_EnumInputs)i);
00102         
00103         PyDict_SetItem(self->m_event_dict, PyLong_FromSsize_t(i), PyLong_FromSsize_t(inevent.m_status));
00104     }
00105     Py_INCREF(self->m_event_dict);
00106     return self->m_event_dict;
00107 }
00108 
00109 PyObject* SCA_PythonMouse::pyattr_get_active_events(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00110 {
00111     SCA_PythonMouse* self = static_cast<SCA_PythonMouse*>(self_v);
00112 
00113     PyDict_Clear(self->m_event_dict);
00114     
00115     for (int i=SCA_IInputDevice::KX_BEGINMOUSE; i<=SCA_IInputDevice::KX_ENDMOUSE; i++)
00116     {
00117         const SCA_InputEvent & inevent = self->m_mouse->GetEventValue((SCA_IInputDevice::KX_EnumInputs)i);
00118         
00119         if (inevent.m_status != SCA_InputEvent::KX_NO_INPUTSTATUS)
00120             PyDict_SetItem(self->m_event_dict, PyLong_FromSsize_t(i), PyLong_FromSsize_t(inevent.m_status));
00121     }
00122     Py_INCREF(self->m_event_dict);
00123     return self->m_event_dict;
00124 }
00125 
00126 PyObject* SCA_PythonMouse::pyattr_get_position(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00127 {
00128     SCA_PythonMouse* self = static_cast<SCA_PythonMouse*>(self_v);
00129     const SCA_InputEvent & xevent = self->m_mouse->GetEventValue(SCA_IInputDevice::KX_MOUSEX);
00130     const SCA_InputEvent & yevent = self->m_mouse->GetEventValue(SCA_IInputDevice::KX_MOUSEY);
00131 
00132     float x_coord, y_coord;
00133 
00134     x_coord = self->m_canvas->GetMouseNormalizedX(xevent.m_eventval);
00135     y_coord = self->m_canvas->GetMouseNormalizedY(yevent.m_eventval);
00136 
00137     PyObject* ret = PyTuple_New(2);
00138 
00139     PyTuple_SET_ITEM(ret, 0, PyFloat_FromDouble(x_coord));
00140     PyTuple_SET_ITEM(ret, 1, PyFloat_FromDouble(y_coord));
00141 
00142     return ret;
00143 }
00144 
00145 int SCA_PythonMouse::pyattr_set_position(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef, PyObject *value)
00146 {
00147     SCA_PythonMouse* self = static_cast<SCA_PythonMouse*>(self_v);
00148     int x, y;
00149     float pyx, pyy;
00150     if (!PyArg_ParseTuple(value, "ff:position", &pyx, &pyy))
00151         return PY_SET_ATTR_FAIL;
00152 
00153     x = (int)(pyx*self->m_canvas->GetWidth());
00154     y = (int)(pyy*self->m_canvas->GetHeight());
00155 
00156     self->m_canvas->SetMousePosition(x, y);
00157 
00158     return PY_SET_ATTR_SUCCESS;
00159 }
00160 
00161 PyObject* SCA_PythonMouse::pyattr_get_visible(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00162 {
00163     SCA_PythonMouse* self = static_cast<SCA_PythonMouse*>(self_v);
00164 
00165     int visible;
00166 
00167     if (self->m_canvas->GetMouseState() == RAS_ICanvas::MOUSE_INVISIBLE)
00168         visible = 0;
00169     else
00170         visible = 1;
00171 
00172     return PyBool_FromLong(visible);
00173 }
00174 
00175 int SCA_PythonMouse::pyattr_set_visible(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef, PyObject *value)
00176 {
00177     SCA_PythonMouse* self = static_cast<SCA_PythonMouse*>(self_v);
00178 
00179     int visible = PyObject_IsTrue(value);
00180 
00181     if (visible == -1)
00182     {
00183         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_AttributeError, "SCA_PythonMouse.visible = bool: SCA_PythonMouse, expected True or False");
00184         return PY_SET_ATTR_FAIL;
00185     }
00186 
00187     if (visible)
00188         self->m_canvas->SetMouseState(RAS_ICanvas::MOUSE_NORMAL);
00189     else
00190         self->m_canvas->SetMouseState(RAS_ICanvas::MOUSE_INVISIBLE);
00191 
00192     return PY_SET_ATTR_SUCCESS;
00193 }
